main.summary: The DataConfigs service manages StorageSilos and determines which a user may access.
main.remarks: Tokens are obtained from Azure Enterprise Catalog Applications and should have a .Read or .Write role.

method.name: GetAuthorizedReadSilo
method.summary: Determines which Catalog user token may Read from.
method.returns: StorageSilo for which token possesses a .Read role.

method.name: GetAuthorizedWriteSilo
method.summary: Determines which Catalog user token may Write to.
method.returns: StorageSilo for which token possesses a .Write role.

method.name: GetStorageSilos
method.remarks: Caller must be System Admin. See Secure service.

method.name: SetStorageSilos
method.summary: Replace all StorageSilos. Token must have Admin.All role.
method.remarks: Caller must be System Admin. See Secure service.
method.returns: True if all StorageSilos set successfully.
